full_text: Fen a oe BAe 2020/KER/586 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE P.B.SURESH KUMAR TUESDAY, THE 07TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 17TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.9084 OF 2019(E) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CRMC 2522/2019 OF DISTRICT COURT & SESSIONS COURT, ERNAKULAM AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CMP 1406/2019 OF TEMPORARY JUDL. FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT, NJARAKKAL CRIME NO.1468/2019 OF Narakkal Police Station , Ernakulam PETITIONER/ACCUSED: SABU C.S., AGED 35 YEARS S/O.SANTHOSH, CHATTHANATT HOUSE, NARAKKAL.P.O., ERNAKULAM-682505. BY ADVS. SRI .PRAVEEN .H. SRI.G.HARTHARAN SMT .K.S.SMITHA SMT .T.T.SHANIBA SRI.M.V.VIPINDAS D.AMALDEV RESPONDENT/STATE AND COMPLAINANT: 1 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-682031. 2 SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, NARAKKAL POLICE STATION, ERNAKULAM-682505. BY SPECIAL PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI. SANTHOSH PETER THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 07.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: a 2020/KER/586 Crl.M.C. No. 9084 of 2019 Cri.M.C. No. 9084 of 2019 ORDER The petitioner is the sole accused in Crime No. 1468 of 2019 of Njarakkal Police Station registered under Sections 366A and 370 of the Indian Penal Code. He was arrested and enlarged on regular bail by the Sessions Court in terms of Annexure A3 order dated 30.11.2019. In the course of investigation, the following articles were recovered from the petitioner: 1. VW POLO 1.2 CR Car having Engine No.CFW151011, Chasis No. WVWF11609BT072529 and registration No. KL-O7-BT-5843 along with original certificate of registration, insurance and tax tokens. 2. Space Black colour Redmi Note 7 Pro mobile Phone IME] bearing no.861934048975294 and 861934048975302. 3. Kerala State Driving License having a 2020/KER/586 Crl.M.C. No. 9084 of 2019 no.42/4969/2002 4. Two number of 500 currencies 5. Four number of 200 currencies 6. Twenty two number of 100 currencies 7. Thirty two number of 50 currencies After being released on bail, the petitioner moved an application under Section 451 of the Code of Criminal Procedure for release of the aforesaid articles. The said application was rejected by the jurisdictional Magistrate in terms of Annexure Al order. Annexure Al order is under challenge in this Crl.M.C. 2. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner as also the learned Public Prosecutor. 3. At the time of hearing, the learned counsel for the petitioner only pressed for release of the vehicle, mobile phone and his driving licence, recovered from the petitioner. The learned Public Prosecutor submitted that the said articles can be ordered to be released subject to appropriate conditions. es, sl soul ops 2020/KER/586 Crl.M.C. No. 9084 of 2019 4. In the circumstances, the Crl.M.C. is disposed of directing the jurisdictional Magistrate to issue orders for release of the vehicle, mobile phone and driving licence recovered from the petitioner, imposing appropriate conditions. Sd/- P.B.SURESH KUMAR JUDGE ds 07.01.2020 Fen a oe Ber 2020/KER/586 Crl.M.C. No. 9084 of 2019 Oe. APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al CERTIFIED COPY OF THE ORDER DATED 13.12.2019 PASSED IN CMP.NO.1406/2019 IN CRIME NO.1468/2019 (NARAKKAL POLICE STATION) BY THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT, NARAKKAL. ANNEXURE A2 A TRUE COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.1468/2019 OF NARAKKAL POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE A3 A TRUE COPY OF THE ORDER IN CRL.M.C.NO.2522/2019 PASSED BY THE HON'BLE DISTRICT AND SESSIONS COURT, ERNARKULAM . ANNEXURE A4 A TRUE COPY OF THE PETITION FILED BY THE PETITIONER. ANNEXURE A5 A TRUE COPY OF THE OBJECTION FILED BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT TO ANNEXURE A3. ANNEXURE A6 A TRUE COPY OF THE REGISTRATION DETAILS OF VEHICLE NO.KLO7-BT-5843 MAINTAINED IN THE WEBSITE OF THE MOTOR VEHICLES DEPARTMENT.
